meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Gwynedd Stuart Henry Ayoola Travis Rojakovick Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7665.

td.p: Gwynedd Stuart, a writer and editor from Los Angeles, California
Henry Ayoola, a Ph.D. student from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Travis Rojakovick, an equity analyst from Nashville, Tennessee (whose 1-day cash winnings total $18,450)

tr.td: PAINT THE TOWN RED
6-LETTER WORDS
LIFE IN 1977
"F"OOD FOR THOUGHT
MATH
STAN LEE

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Alex: With less than a minute now.)

the Kremlin

Gwynedd
')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
